Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Basketball, Football, Hockey, Soccer

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class provides ability to implement a variety of games and provides almost all the necessary functions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zach Swanson

    • Field Summary

      length of one period in game in format HH:MM:SS
      private java.lang.String periodName
      name of periods in game
      private java.util.ArrayList<ScoringMethod> scoringMethods
      list of all possible scoring methods in game
